storyInfo: The Doctor leaves Babel to learn more about Terra and rescues a child by the name of Amiya.

attributes.content: Dear Kal'tsit,
Glad to receive your letter. Hope you and everyone in Babel are well.
A couple of months ago, I rescued a girl by the name of Amiya from a convoy that had met with misfortune.
The accident killed her parents and afflicted her with Oripathy.
The locals deal with orphaned Oripathy patients by putting them in a car and driving them into the wastes. I had no choice but to take her with me.
We have become fellow travelers by chance.
You can't imagine my panic and helplessness as I took care of her...
Fortunately, a woman who goes by the name of Savage has joined our little band, which has helped take some of the burden off me.
A shadow leaps out of the dunes in the moonlight.
(Approaches cautiously)
(Threatening roar)
Hey! Go away!
Don't come any closer!
(Rubs claws excitedly)
attributes.name: Massive Sandbeast

attributes.content: (Moves head in confusion)
attributes.name: Young Sandbeast

attributes.content: You seem to have made them even more excited, Amiya.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Don't worry, Doctor, I can deal with this!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mum and Dad taught me how to chase the sandbeasts away. All you need to do is imitate the sound of their natural enemies.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Chirp, chirp...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Pauses in confusion)
attributes.name: Massive Sandbeast

attributes.content: Wait, that wasn't right. Was it 'Chip, chip'?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Tilts head in confusion)
attributes.name: Young Sandbeast

attributes.content: It's still not right. What was it again?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: 'Aoww'? 'Ku, ku'? 'Tick, tock'?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Swings tail in confusion)
attributes.name: Massive Sandbeast

attributes.content: That's not right either...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's okay, Amiya. I'll take care of this.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: The Doctor makes a ring with thumb and index finger, and whistles, producing a strange sound.
(Stands up startled)
attributes.name: Massive Sandbeast

attributes.content: (Looks around uneasily)
attributes.name: Young Sandbeast

attributes.content: (Quickly digs a hole)
attributes.name: Massive Sandbeast

attributes.content: (Slowly follows)
attributes.name: Young Sandbeast

attributes.content: Wow, Doctor! That was just like the real thing!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Let me try!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya presses her tiny hand against her lips, but used too much force, and only gets a sound out after going all red and puffy in the face.
The pair of whistles echo across the wastes, sending the sandbeasts scurrying underground.
A child's laughter replaces the whistles.
Then the laughter fades away to silence, and a soft little sigh.
Come here, Amiya.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Why the sullen look? The sandbeast ran off.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: I could never remember, even after Mum and Dad taught me so many times... and I couldn't protect you, even though I said I would.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Your hand's still wounded... it hasn't fully healed.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't worry, it doesn't hurt. Anyway, don't you remember?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: It was you who taught me how to make that sound.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: I did?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You see? Like I told you, your brain slows down and you start to forget things, if you don't sleep.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: I... I don't want to sleep.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm scared that I'll dream of... those things.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But you told me you dream of your parents too.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Um...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We have some time before our ride gets here. Have a sleep.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Can I come closer?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: When I wake up... the first thing I want to see is you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Of course. Why don't I tell you a few stories while we wait for Savage?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: A long time ago, there was a really smart scientist...
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Her home was in danger, and she made a difficult choice to protect it and the people around her...
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Doctor, I found a vehicle! We'll be able to go to the next—
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: (Whisper) Shh, she's sleeping.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Dear Kal'tsit, I was glad to find signs of life wherever I went.

This should be an unfamiliar world, yet there are times when it feels incredibly familiar. I recall the legends that had fascinated me in the past, never failing to capture my imagination despite their age.
The ancient machines that had rumbled in the mines and dust once again roam this land.
Stories can become reality, and the reality we see can become stories.
You can come over, Amiya. No need to keep poking your head out from there.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Are you drawing, Doctor? Am I interrupting?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Of course not.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Take a look. Is it good?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: It's the mining truck we just drove together!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I've been drawing lots of our experiences.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Have you driven a mining truck before? Even the old miners can't go as fast as you did.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I've seen many amazing vehicles before. Like Originium slug eggs, but much larger. Once, I drove one of them...
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: ...and went through the bridge between stars.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: The bridge between stars? It's always dark at night, so it must've been really dark! Was it dangerous?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No. Guides stand by the bridge, borrowing glowing clouds from old stars and making round mirrors out of them.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Follow the path the mirrors show, and we can...
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: We can...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: See the spires fading in and out of the clouds, and the crown of flowers worn by the stars, on the other side of the bridge.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: When we descend on the crown, you'll find that it belongs to good children like you. It's a really, really big playground.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: A playground? I've read about them in the stories... there are lots of children there.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Do you want to play with other children?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: No. I... I just want to play with you, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You'll make more friends as you grow up.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: As I grow up...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What's the most amazing vehicle you've ever driven?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The most amazing...? Well... I spent a very long time with it. Very long indeed.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Was there anyone else with you?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: In the beginning, yes. In the end, though, I was alone.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: ...But it's alright. I was sleeping. I slept for a very long time.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Take me with you next time! That way, I can keep you company and you won't have to sleep all day.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Hehe.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Why are you laughing, Doctor?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That's a big promise to make. Are you sure?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: You'll have your own journey, your vision, your future... are you sure you want to be with me?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: But they all say that... there's no future for people with rocks on them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So... I'll always be with you...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We'll have a future, Amiya.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: How's Amiya doing? Still not great?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Hm... still a bit of fever. Maybe Oripathy complications from all the excitement. Hard to find Oripathy meds around these parts.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: She acts like it's nothing during the day, but keeps having nightmares. Poor girl...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Every survivor of that accident was infected. No exceptions.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: How long does it take for Oripathy to progress in a child her age?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: It's different for everyone. Some disintegrate the day after developing acute symptoms. Some suffer for more than a decade of misery.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: But the end is always the same.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Oripathy... is there anyone in the world who can cure it?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: The world? Oh, you mean Terra, our great land? Man, you sound like one of those old scholars. I didn't know you had a sense of humor.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Wait... you're serious?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I'm afraid not. It's impossible.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I need it to be possible.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: People couldn't imagine the nomadic cities a few centuries ago, could they?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: I'll find a way, before her symptoms deteriorate. It may be hard, but that doesn't mean it's impossible.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Say it to a Rim Billy, and they'll think you're making fun of them.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: You never fail to surprise me, but I just can't help but believe in you.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Is that the charm of being smart?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Come on, Charlotte.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Hehe, I meant you... never mind.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Oh, I meant... hm...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Can't you tell? There's something about you... something that lets everyone know that you're different from us.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Amiya senses it. Children are more sensitive than we know.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Is it that obvious?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: She's strong. She doesn't show her sadness in front of you. She wants you to see her joy. She doesn't want to be a burden to you; she's trying to take care of you.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: You became the only pillar in her life the day you saved it.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: But she knows you were never supposed to cross paths. She's afraid that you'll abandon her too.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Don't worry. I won't leave her.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Now that's the spirit.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I knew you would say that.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Dear Kal'tsit, I thought I would never be more a passing visitor in this place, one history would never remember.
This intentional isolation made me forget reality: I am here, on Terra, this great land.
I don't know what made me feel it.
But the warmth of life coming from a child's palm stings my heart and makes it burn.
This is...
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Jerky and fruit. Left here on purpose.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: They know I'm here?
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Always inscrutable.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Dear Kal'tsit, I'm planning to take Amiya back to Babel.
Savage has done her best to find medicine for Amiya, but my ability to treat Amiya's Oripathy is limited under present conditions.
I know that Amiya isn't special, by any objective standard. I know that Babel faces a crisis no less complicated, but I've decided to bring her back.
I met many people along the way. I've fretted over money at times, benefitted from people's generosity at others. I've seen new things, even some that surprised me for the first time in a long while.
The convoy that we were traveling with broke down. We found a herder to guide us through the wilderness of Rim Billiton on the backs of burdenbeasts, to the rumbling of drills and engines.
(Licks docilely)
attributes.name: Burdenbeast

attributes.content: Good boy, good boy.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Are we really not going to Yan, Doctor?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We're going somewhere else, to cure your sickness.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: But... there's no cure for Oripathy...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There's no such thing as an impossible puzzle, Amiya.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: There's a place called Babel, where people I trust are working hard to fight this disease.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Let's work with them.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Will I have to spend a long time there?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Some time, at least. But don't worry, there'll be a lot of people with you, caring for you. I'll be there, too.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Doctor... do we really have to go?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Lots of sick kids went away to get treated, but no one came back...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oripathy doesn't hurt at all.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I promise I'll be good, Doctor. Right, Savage?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yes... Amiya has always been a good girl.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Are you sure you don't want to rethink this, Doctor?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Billies deal with Originium every day. We know what Oripathy can do.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Stay here in Rim Billiton, and at least we can give her... a home.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Maybe that's more important than the cold walls of a laboratory.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: ...A home.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: You have a point. But I can't just stand by and watch Originium hurt her... I have an obligation.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Amiya, I promise you, I'll do my best to cure you, no matter what happens.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Doctor...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Savage does have a point, though, and Babel is in a place that's not entirely safe.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: You can stay with Savage, if you don't want to leave Rim Billiton.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: I'm sorry to force this decision on you at such a young age... but you're a strong girl, and we'll respect your choice.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: The Doctor's right, Amiya. No need to knee-jerk an answer. Think carefully about it.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: ...I trust you, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I want to have a future. I want to grow up, read books with you, travel with Savage. I...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's just that... I'm a little scared...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Thank you, Amiya.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: The Doctor pats Amiya's head, then picks her up and climbs onto the burdenbeast.
They've hardly sat down when the ground begins to shake, stirring up clouds of dust.
(Growls in alarm)
attributes.name: Burdenbeast

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: —Underneath our feet!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Must be a deep digger! It's spooking the burdenbeast! Watch out!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: (Panicked cry)
attributes.name: Burdenbeast

attributes.content: Stay, boy, stay! Whoa!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Whoa!
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Hang in there, Doctor!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The burdenbeast rears up on its hind legs, gives a loud cry, then charges forward.
The rest of the pack follows.
They run towards a shallow shoal, splashing water everywhere.
It is all the Doctor can do to grab the fur on the back of the burdenbeast and hang on for dear life.
Amiya's eyes are wide-open in the chaos.
With one hand on the burdenbeast, she stretches out the other towards the Doctor.
Grab my hand, Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Angry roar)
attributes.name: Burdenbeast

attributes.content: (Accelerates)
attributes.name: Burdenbeast

attributes.content: I have to get them to—whoa!
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Hang on! It's speeding up!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm—try—ing!
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Hang in there, Doctor! I'm coming!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Hur—ry!
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Whooooaaaahhhh—!
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: In the end, I was thrown from the back of the burdenbeast into the water.
My hindquarters and back burned with pain, and I gagged on the water rushing into my nose.
But it also made me feel like I was truly living on this land, after spending almost half a year traveling across it.
I heard the sound of my life surging.
Summer, 1091
Kazdel
...No more Messenger stations from here on.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Villages become sparse, and bandits become frequent...
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I'm afraid we have to part ways here, Savage.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: The region ahead is in turmoil. You'll be in danger, if the mercenaries spot you.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: You and Amiya will be in danger too, won't you?
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: I'll be fine! I've come this far, I'll see your journey through to the end.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Charlotte... thank you.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: The Cautus's ears quiver at the mention of her real name. She glances at the Doctor.
A few months is neither long nor short.
True, it comprised only a tiny part of her lifetime, but it was also a span of a few hundred days, filled with countless unforgettable experiences.
Under the setting sun, before the sandbeasts, beneath the eaves. Upon this land.
She had enjoyed the journey, even if she never fully understood her quiet companion, and the many strange and curious ideas that companion had.
The Cautus who goes by the name of Savage sighs. What can she do? She is not as smart as the Doctor.
Will you come and visit, Savage?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Of course!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: The Doctor said Babel's new base is being worked on by Billy engineers, right? Maybe we'll see each other soon!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Then... I'll be waiting for you, Savage.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Good girl, Amiya. Now, though, I need to figure out how to take you and the Doctor through the wilderness!
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: You and Amiya stay here and rest for a while, Doctor. I'll see if the transport hub ahead has any good vehicles for hire.
attributes.name: Savage

attributes.content: Doctor.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Whoa!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Do we have time to say goodbye?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: The longer we stay here, the more dangerous it gets.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: The Cautus girl seems rather determined. It's better for both of you to part ways here.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: ...I suppose you're right.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: We won't wait for Savage?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Sometimes, Amiya, we have to do bad things for good reasons.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: We don't want Savage to be in danger, do we? But she doesn't want to leave you.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: It's rude to leave without saying goodbye, but that way, Savage won't face danger.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Um...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I promise, we'll get to see her again.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Can I leave a note for Savage? She'll be worried if she comes back to find us gone.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Good thinking. Go ahead and write one.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Her Highness wants to meet with you, alone.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Are things not going well? How's Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Now is not the time.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: We'll leave once the girl has written her note.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Alright. Can we trouble you with the note?
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Certainly. I'll leave it where she is sure to see it.
attributes.name: Ascalon
